champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the Department of Youth and Sports of the executive body of the Kyiv City Council (Kyiv City State Administration) (hereinafter - the Department) and the Separate Unit of the NGO "National Kyokushinkai Karate Federation of Ukraine" (hereinafter - the Separate Unit). The responsibility for the preparation and direct conduct of the competition rests with the main panel of judges formed by the Separate Unit.


Organizing committee and judges:

  • Chief judge of the competition - judge of the international category Serhiy Bronistovsky, 6th dan (Kyiv)
  • Secretary of the competition — Vladyslav Trifonov, judge of the II category (Kyiv)
  • Technical support — Igor Tatarchenko (Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Kyiv, ZOSH 128, st. Raisy Okipnoi, 6

The competition will be held in Kyiv on January 27-28, 2024.

Competition program

January 27 (Saturday):

  • 08:00 - 10:00 registration and weighing of athletes (mandatory)
  • 09:00 – 10:00 a.m. meeting of judges, formation of judging teams
  • 10:00 - 13:30 Competition among younger boys/girls, boys/girls (born 2017-2014)
  • 13:30 – 14:00 Lunch break
  • 14:00 – 14:30 Ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 14:30 – 15.00 Awarding of champions and prize-winners (born in 2017-2014)
  • 15:00 – 18:30 Competition among younger boys/girls, boys/girls (born 2013-2010)
  • 18:00 – 19:00 Awarding of champions and prize-winners (born in 2013-2010)

January 28 (Sunday):

  • 08:30 – 09:00 meeting of judges, formation of judging teams
  • 09:00 – 09:30 Ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 09:30 – 14:00 Competition among adults, juniors and young men
  • 17:30 – 18:30: Awarding of champions and prize winners

Competition rules.

  • Competitions are held separately for male and female participants

Categories of participants:

Younger boys/girls:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
2010-2011 Young men -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 55+
2010-2011 Girls -35 -40 -45 -50 50+
2012-2013 Young men -30 -35 -40 -45 -50 50+
2012-2013 Girls -30 -35 -40 -45 45+
2014-2015 Young men -25 -30 -35 -40 -45 45+
2014-2015 Girls -25 -30 -35 -40 40+
2016-2017 Young men -20 -25 -30 -35 -40 40+
2016-2017 Girls -20 -25 -30 -35 -40 40+
Scheme of matches: 1 min., 1 min., weighing (difference in weight 2.0 kg), 1 min.

Boys/girls:
Scheme of matches: 1.5 min., 1.5 min., weighing (difference in weight 2.0 kg) 1.5 min.


Juniors:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
2008-2009 Young men -40 -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 65+
2008-2009 Girls -40 -45 -50 -55 55+
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
2006-2007 Juniors -50 -55 -60 -65 -70 -75 75+
2006-2007 Junior girls -45 -50 -55 -60 60+
Scheme of matches: 2.0 min., 2.0 min., weighing (difference in weight 3.0 kg) 2.0 min.


Men/women:
Year of birth Gender Weight categories
1990-2005 Men -60 -70 -80 -90 90+
1990-2005 women -50 -55 -60 -65 65+
Conducting scheme:
Qualifiers: 2.0 min., 2.0 min., weighing (difference in weight 5.0 kg) 2.0 min.
Semifinal/final: 3.0 min., 2.0 min., weighing (difference in weight 5.0 kg) 2.0 min.


Competition conditions

Athletes compete in sports uniforms and mandatory personal protectors in accordance with the rules of kyokushinkai karate competitions in force in Ukraine. Competitions of all age groups will be held according to the rules of UFKK and WFKO (all techniques are allowed by FullContact)

  • Helmets according to the standards of the current rules will be provided by the organizers of the competition, it is possible to use personal helmets that meet the standard (a helmet with a protective plastic mask).For the purpose of hygiene, the use of personal helmet pads (disposable or reusable)
    • is allowed
  • Groin and shin protectors (white, soft, elastic, fastening - "stocking"), hand protectors (white, soft, elastic, fastening - "stocking"), chest protector (for girls, worn under a white t-shirt) are personal and mandatory

Financing

The competition is financed by the Department of Youth and Sports Executive body of the Kyiv City Council (Kyiv City State Administration), awarding cubes is carried out at the expense of a separate division and other extra-budgetary revenues.

Awards

  • Athletes who took 1-3 places are awarded with cups, medals, diplomas of the respective degrees

Registration

Registration for participation in the competition takes place through a personal account until January 20, 2024. Or to the e-mail of the organizing committee:
Tatarchenkoiu@ukr.net
Ihor Yuriyovych Tatarchenko tel. +38(067)-788-77-28
Kryvytsky Roman Vitaliyovych tel. +38(050)-264-08-72

Application letter for participation according to the form established by the NFKKU, approved by the medical and physical culture dispensary and the head of sports. Organizations are submitted to the mandate commission before the start of the competition. Teams that have confirmed their participation within the set deadline are admitted to the competition
